thinking: I need to find an archway. Currently, I see a building with a door and barrels in the center and left-hand side, and another building on the right-hand side. No archway is visible. I'll turn left to explore the area.
I've turned left. I now see stairs on the left-hand side and the building with the door is more central. I still don't see an archway. I need to continue exploring, so I'll turn left again.

Now I see a large, gated archway on the left-hand side. The building and stairs are on the right-hand side. This looks like the archway I'm looking for. To align myself with it, I'll turn left to center it in my view.
The archway is now centered in my view. There's a path leading directly to it. I'll start moving forward along the path towards the archway.
I'm moving along the path. The archway is still centered in front of me. I need to get closer, so I'll continue moving forward.
I've moved closer, but the archway seems to have drifted slightly to the right-hand side of my view. To re-center it for a direct approach, I'll turn slightly left.
The archway is centered again. I see another arched structure on the far left-hand side, but the main gated archway is directly ahead. I'll continue moving forward towards the main archway.
I'm getting closer to the archway, which remains centered. The path leads straight towards it. I'll keep moving forward.
As I moved forward, the archway ended up slightly on the left-hand side of my view. To ensure I'm heading straight towards it, I'll turn slightly to the right to center it again.
The archway is now centered and much closer. The path leads directly through it. I'll move forward to approach it.
I'm continuing along the path towards the archway. It's still centered and getting larger in my view. I need to keep moving forward.
I'm very close to the archway now. It's centered and fills a significant portion of my view. I'll move forward again.
I am right in front of the archway gate now. It's centered. To go to the archway, I need to pass through it. I'll move forward.
I am currently inside the archway structure. The gate is above me. To fully reach the goal of 'going to' the archway, I should move completely through it. I'll move forward again.
I'm passing through the archway now and can see the area beyond. I need one more step to be completely clear of the structure. I'll move forward.
I have moved forward and am now standing just past the archway structure. I have successfully reached and gone to the archway. The task is complete.
